feed.title: Table for economic nodes: Covenants Support - Bitcoin Wiki

entry.title: Table for economic nodes: Covenants Support - Bitcoin Wiki
entry.summary: In a recent communication aimed at the Bitcoin Development Mailing List subscribers, an update was provided concerning the inclusion of a previously omitted link. This link directs to a valuable resource for understanding covenants within the Bitcoin ecosystem. Specifically, it is a support wiki page that can be accessed via [https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Covenants_support](https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Covenants_support), offering in-depth insights into covenants and their implications for economic nodes within the network. This additional information serves as a crucial tool for developers and participants in the Bitcoin community, enhancing their knowledge and capabilities regarding the development and analysis of blockchain covenants.
